## IsTuple type

If T is a tuple, return true, else return false.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IsTuple<T extends readonly unknown[]> = T extends T
  ? IsExtends<T, Tuple>
  : never
```
**References:** [IsExtends](./types-kit.isextends.md)<!-- -->, [Tuple](./types-kit.tuple.md)

## Example


```ts
// Expect: true
type Foo = IsTuple<[1, 2, 3]>
```
